original_text: Now I must punish these other people that did not want me to rule over them. Bring them here and kill them in front of me.” ’
korean_text: 그리고 내가 왕 됨을 원하지 아니하던 저 원수들을 이리로 끌어다가 내 앞에서 죽이라 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: Now I must punish these other people
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 내가 이 다른 사람들을 벌해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: that did not want me to rule over them
and kill them in front of me
